```{pyodide}
import micropip
await micropip.install("polars")
import polars as pl

# Create a sample DataFrame
df = pl.DataFrame({
    "fruit": ["Apple", "Banana", "Apple", "Banana", "Apple"],
    "count": [2, 3, 1, 4, 3],
    "city": ["SF", "SF", "NY", "NY", "SF"]
})

# Group by 'city' and 'fruit' and sum the counts
result = df.group_by("city", "fruit").agg(pl.col("count").sum())

print(result)
```
